text: Kerri Allyson Strug (b. November 19, 1977 in Tucson, Arizona) is a retired American gymnast. She won a gold medal in the 1996 Summer Olympics. She is remembered for performing the vault despite hurting her ankle. ==References== Category:American gymnasts Category:Sportspeople from Arizona Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:1977 births Category:Living people
title: Kerri Strug
